snippet: A first-person account of getting married at the 56th Grammy Awards. Queen Latifah makes it official, with Macklemore and Madonna providing the vocals for a ceremony with 32 other couples.
abstract: Adam Gropman, Los Angeles comedian, offers first-person account of getting married at 56th Grammy Awards, along with 32 other couples, with Queen Latifah officiating and Macklemore and Madonna providing vocals for the ceremony.
lead_paragraph: A first-person account of getting married at the 56th Grammy Awards. Queen Latifah makes it official, with Macklemore and Madonna providing the vocals for a ceremony with 32 other couples.

headline.main: You Can’t Beat These Wedding Singers
headline.print_headline: You Can’t Beat These Wedding Singers

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
